snippet: An Islamist party leader was convicted of the genocide of unarmed civilians during the 1971 war to break away from Pakistan.
abstract: Bangladesh tribunal convicts Islamist party leader Mohammad Kamaruzzaman of atrocities in country’s war of independence and sentences him to death, generating a nationwide wave of violent protest from leader’s supporters.
lead_paragraph: An Islamist party leader was convicted of the genocide of unarmed civilians during the 1971 war to break away from Pakistan.

headline.seo: Islamist Leader in Bangladesh Gets Death Sentence for War Atrocities
headline.main: Death Sentence in Bangladesh for War Atrocities
headline.print_headline: Death Sentence for Bangladeshi War Atrocities

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
